text:
1//

Tag names do not support a '-' in the tag name

e.g. 'submit-button'

This results in error from this generated jsp code:

_jspx_th_view_submit-button_0.setPageContext(pageContext);

Im sure this is allowed or at least implied in the jsp spec

2//

Also similar - but not sure if it meets spec or not - so a question

What is allowed for a attribute symbol

'big-label' obviously doesnt work

This could be converted to "bigLabel" easily.
creator: steves@bravenewworld.co.nz
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1657 ***
